description: New features and bug fixes (requires Java 6)

issues.title: Clear ThreadData after all streams are closed, fixes a memory leak
[SFTP] Failure when files are very large
[HTTP] File can't be read if HEAD method is not supported (405 status)
SmbFileObject throws NPE when used without authentication
Unable to download file if saved in FTP root directory
[SFTP][RAM] Unsafe casting to AbstractFileObject subclasses in doRename().
ClassCastException in LocalFileSystem when using OnCall caching
AbstractFileObject.getChildren(): internal structures will be left inconsistent if the excepion is thrown
[FTP] Socket timeout setting doesn't work if connect hangs
New instance of SftpFileSystem is created every time due to the bug in FileSystemOptions.compareTo()
ThreadLocal memory leak in DefaultFileContent
[FTP] Configuration does not include option for setting socket timeout.
AbstractFileObject sometimes uses getFileSystem() and sometimes references "fs" field directly
Bad handling of hashs (#) in file names when walking a file tree using findFiles()
UriParser.canonicalizePath possible NPE for filenameParser
MonitorInputStream.read() methods should be synchronised
Possible crash in extractWindowsRootPrefix method
Small patch to not swallow SFTP exception from JSCH
ZipFileSystem makes improper assumptions about FileCache
[FTP] Client should call logout before disconnecting
RamFileProvider: ReadingRamFileRandomAccessContent InputStream of file does not return -1 when empty...
RamFileRandomAccessContent.seek() allows seeking before file start.
It is possible to delete a ram://file (RamFileObject) while using a RandomAccessContent.
WebdavFileObject.isCurrentFile fails if response.getHref returns just the path.
SFTP documentation implies that "userDirIsRoot" defaults to true
Incorrect lazy initialization of static field org.apache.commons.vfs2.util.Messages.resources in org.apache.commons.vfs2.util.Messages.findMessage(String)
Tar error message are missing from resource file
FTP connect.error message used instead of SFTP connect.error message
SFTP getChildren() does not fail when called on a file
[POM] Remove maven-scm-* dependencies.
[RAM] resize throws ArrayOOBE when shrinking in size.
[RAM] Reading a RAM FileSystem file fails because it never returns EOF -1.
CompressedFileFileObject Exception thrown when container file has no extension
[SFTP] SftpFileObject getInputStream(long) reads the whole file into memory
[FTP] No support for FTP servers with non Latin-1 control encoding
Update to Apache Commons Compress 1.4.1
VFS 2.0 class loading breaks in OSGi, regression from 1.0
HTTP URL query string not part of cache key
[HTTP] NPE on HttpFileObject.getContent().getContentInfo()
The SoftRefFilesCache class logs clear text password
FileSystemOption does not implement toString()
[HTTP][WebDAV] Allow HTTP follow redirect
Message "vfs.provider.webdav/propfind.error" is not defined.
FileSystemException should reuse IOException's chained exception
FileSystemConfigBuilder does not use prefix for some system property lookups.
[FTP] StackOverFlowError getting the type of a directory with a symbolic link to a parent directory with the same name
StaticUserAuthenticator usage example wrong
Update Apache Commons Net to 3.2 from 3.1.
HDFS Provider is not removing cached files
HDFSFileSystem.resolveFile() does not honor CacheStrategy.ON_RESOLVE
Authentication fails using private key
HttpFileObject read/write attributes should reflect underlying FileSystem capabilities
FTPS implementation incomplete and buggy compared to FTP
commons-compress not optional
[FTP/FTPS] Cannot set SoTimeout and Encoding with system properties
StaticUserAuthenticator ignores requested authentication types
[WebDAV] Dependency javax.jrc:jcr is not used
[VFS] SoftRefFilesCache Doesn't Ever Clear Cache
Wrong assertion messages in RAM provider test case
DefaultFileMonitor sleeps for twice the specified delay when checkPerRun > 0
File creation events missed when deleted then re-created within poll delay
[tests] ProviderWriteTests#testListener does not fail cleanly
[vfsclassloader] tries to open folders with .zip or .jar extension
[SFTP] No support for SFTP servers with non Latin-1 file name encoding
Resource translation issues
OSGI MANIFEST.MF "Import-Package" should be ";resolution:=optional" for Maven "optional" dependencies
Cannot open a sFTP FileObject pointing on  the root directory, create a local FS object instead
Equals on URLFileName should use the complete URL
moveTo fails with SFTPFileObject if CacheStrategy.ON_CALL is set
$Date in checkstyle.xml
[tests] PermissionsTests leaves unclean test directory
Javadoc is wrong in some places
Javadoc errors with Java 8 defaults
[RAM][tests] Failure with Java 8
HdfsFileObject equals method returns true for the same path on different hosts
No Hdfs testing on Windows
[hdfs][tests] Windows build fails if ls.exe is missing
VirtualFileSystems leak
DefaultFilesCache leaks closed filesystems
SoftRefReleaseThread might leak
BUG - Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm - DefaultCryptor.java
[sandbox] does not contain vfs-provider.xml for automatic registration
[webdav][test] leaves undeleted temp directories around
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException in FtpFileObject
FTPClientWrapper is not robust against some failures
File can't be downloaded if HTTP HEAD on base url fails
FtpFileObject creates Logger instance for each object
Timeout in vsFTPd causes exception when executing another command
warning about not closed OperationProviders when calling DefaultFilesystemManager.close
FileOperationsProvider not shut down
incompatible naming change for tests
Layered Filesystems are not properly cached when options are used
Colon in folder name fire NPE on start up
FIx trivial breakages of binary compatibility with commons-vfs-2.0
Add a FileExtensionSelector class
Add FileObject API deleteAll()
Add FileContent write APIs
Iterate over a FileObject using the Java "foreach" statement, to provide all descendents of a FileObject.
Use variable argument lists in FileSystemException instead of Object[]s
Add a FileSelector based on regular expressions
[FTP] Add config API to set the file type
[RAM][Local] Add and implement new API: RandomAccessContent.setLength(long)
Add API FileObject.isExecutable()
Add an HDFS FileSystem Provider
Add FileSystemManager.resolveFile(URI) and resolveFile(URL)
[FTP] Proxy Support (similiar to VFS-84 for SFTP)
Usage of FTP with heterogeneous FTP server (possibility of using Ascii file type)
Configurable UserAgent for Http(s) Provider
FTP configuration does not include option for setting a timeout on the control connection
[SMB] SmbFileObject does not support setLastModifiedTime while jcifs supports it
Let FileObject and FileContent extend java.io.Closeable
SFTP can not use private keys protected by pass phrase
SFTP library of commons-vfs should include the logging in underling JSCH library
Upgrade to commons-net 2.2
Migarte to current version of Commons Collection (3.1 -> 3.2.1)
Can't sort a List of FileObject's, FileObject to implement Comparable<FileObject>
Add APIs FileObject isFile(), FileObject isFolder(), and FileName isFile()
Add constructors FileDepthSelector() and FileDepthSelector(int)
Replace custom TAR code with Apache Commons Compress 1.3
Replace custom BZIP2 code with Apache Commons Compress 1.3.
Add HTTP status code to HTTP file provider exception messages when available.
Build tests HTTP file system with an embedded HTTP server (Apache HttpComponent Core)
Build tests FTP file system with an embedded FTP server (Apache MINA)
Build tests SFTP file system with an embedded SFTP server (Apache MINA)
Use variable argument list in org.apache.commons.vfs2.util.Messages instead of Object[]
Build tests URL HTTP file system with an embedded HTTP server (Apache HttpComponent Core).
Build tests WebDAV file system with an embedded WebDAV server (Apache Jackrabbit).
Get/set the file permissions
[SFTP] Update Jsch to version 0.1.47 from 0.1.46.
[FTPS] Support to send execPROT("P")
[SFTP] Configure a custom Identity Repository
Remove extra FileSystem ivar in AbstractFileObject subclasses with generics
[SFTP] Stream (e.g. netcat) proxy for Sftp file system (aka ProxyCommand)
commons-vfs 2.0 JAR has flawed OSGi MANIFEST.MF
[VFS] Set socket timeout for HTTP and WebDAV schemes
Log sent FTP/FTPS commands and received answers
[FTPS] Use enum instead of String for FtpsType
Support system propeties for enum-based configuration values
[FTPS] Support client-side certificates
Update Apache Commons Net to 3.3 from 3.2
Update Apache Commons Logging to 1.1.3 from 1.1.2
[SFTP] Update Jsch to 0.1.50 from 0.1.49.
Hide passwords from log/console output
[Tar][Bzip2] Update Apache Commons Compress to 1.6 from 1.5.
Update to Apache Commons Collection 4.0 from 3.2.1 and use generics.
[FTP] Allow configuring remoteVerificationEnabled on FTPClient instances
Update Apache Commons Lang from 3.1 to 3.3.2.
Update Apache Commons Logging from 1.1.3 to 1.2.
Update Apache Commons Compress from 1.6 to 1.9.
Update Jsch from 0.1.50 to 0.1.51.
Replace System.getProperty("file|path.separator") with File.separator|pathSeparator
Add ability to specify alternate HDFS configuration file
Javadoc of SftpFileSystemConfigBuilder.setKnownHosts is inconsistent
Update Apache Commons Compress from 1.9 to 1.10
Update JCraft Jsch from 0.1.51 to 0.1.53
Update Apache Commons Net from 3.3 to 3.4
Update Apache Commons IO from 2.4 to 2.5
Update Apache Commons Compress from 1.10 to 1.11
Update Apache Commons Net from 3.4 to 3.5
Redirect of HTTP url using the header location
[FTP] Set user dir as root dir by default
Documentation of FileSystemOptions should be more helpful
Upgrade to Apache Commons Compress 1.3 from 1.2.
Update JSch to 0.1.45 from 0.1.42 for the SFTP provider.
Update Apache Commons Net to 3.0.1 from 2.2 for FTP and SFTP providers.
Update JSch to 0.1.46 from 0.1.45 for the SFTP provider.
[WebDAV] Update Apache Jackrabbit 1.5.2 to 1.6.5.
[FTP][FTPS] Update Apache Commons Net to 3.1 from 3.0.1
Update Apache Commons Compress to 1.4 from 1.3
Update VFS requirement to Java 1.6
[SFTP] Update Jsch to version 0.1.49 from 0.1.47.
Use bouncycastle dependency for JDK 1.6
Update test dependencies
Update to Apache Commons Compress 1.5
Update HDFS to latest release in prep for VFS 2.1 release
Release 2.1
